resources:
Adventure Settings Back Ground Image Data Structures and Algorithms Start Continue Exit Log Hide Auto Manual Quick Save > Choose!
Okabe:I am Kentaro Okabe, a sophomore of Department of IC, school of Engineering, Den University.
Okabe:Finally, it\'s time to reach the second semester.
Okabe:I have a class by the name of "Data Structures and Algorithms" for my first class of Thursday, though.
Okabe:Somehow, I feel different atmosphere from other classes.
9/18/2016
Okabe:My impression is that the class is quite difficult.
I\'ll study hard.
For the present, I am seeing whether my friends can do it well.
Give up the class.
9/18/2016
Okabe:First, I studied it. But, it was so serious.
Okabe:Nevertheless, I studied it hard so that I can enjoy it more and more.
Okabe:Finally, I received my result. Believe it or not, it is a grade of A.
Okabe:Even though I didn\'t mind what result I can receive the while, I am happy for receiving the good result.
Okabe:Moreover, since I make sense of programming, I can enjoy programming.
End.
3/15/2017
Okabe:Since my friends said "it is OK," while harmonizing with my friends, the winter holidays came.
Okabe:Luckily, I received the programs from somewhere, then, I managed to submit a report to which I included it.
Okabe:But, I received a grade of D. I failed the class. I don\'t know what my fault is.
End.
